remarks: Scalar addition for the final constructed Hilbert space.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Jun-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hlhilsbase.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hlhilsbase.l $e |- L = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhilsbase.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` L ) $.
hlhilsbase.u $e |- U = ( ( HLHil ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhilsbase.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hlhilsbase.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hlhilsplus2.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` S ) $.
hlhilsplus2 $p |- ( ph -> .+ = ( +g ` R ) ) $.
